strings.desc: Massage her shoulders gently.
strings.pros: Massage can provide pain relief and psychological support
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: The massage fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Place firm hands on her shoulders.
strings.pros: Touch can relieve anxiety.
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: Your touch fails to provide encouragement.

strings.desc: Massage her hand or foot, encouraging her to relax.
strings.pros: Massage can provide pain relief and psychological support
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: The massage fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Place firm hands on her hand or foot.
strings.pros: Touch can relieve anxiety.
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: Your touch fails to provide encouragement.

strings.desc: Play a CD of favorite songs or relaxing melodies, or turn on the radio.
strings.pros: Can increase pain tolerance, reinforce or elevate moods; or cue the woman to move or breathe rhythmically
strings.cons: There are no known drawbacks to using music or sound during labor.
strings.fail_msg1: The music is distracting.

strings.desc: Sing along to some favorite music, or just sing.
strings.pros: Music can be soothing, encouraging, and comforting.
strings.cons: There are no known drawbacks to singing during labor.
strings.fail_msg1: It is harder to cope while singing.

strings.desc: Be energy-efficient! Encourage her to try to sleep between contractions.
strings.pros: Conserve energy in early labor, and if an epidural is in place.
strings.cons: There are no known drawbacks to trying to sleep during labor.
strings.fail_msg1: It is hard to fall asleep.

strings.desc: An anaesthesiologist places a catheter into the spinal column to deliver pain-relieving drugs.
strings.pros: Great for an exhausted mom to get some rest
strings.cons: With an epidural, the woman is confined to the bed; Can cause labor to slow if used too early; Some women are unable to feel pushing urge
strings.fail_msg1: The epidural fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Tell her to go home, and come back when in active labor.
strings.pros: May be more comfortable to wait at home for active labor
strings.fail_msg1: I want to stay here.
strings.fail_msg2: Are you kidding? I'm not going home now!

strings.desc: Turn down the lights.
strings.pros: Makes the environment more pleasant; increases ability to concentrate.
strings.fail_msg1: The darkness is unpleasant.

strings.desc: Stroke her back and arms in rhythm with her breathing.
strings.pros: Helps her focus her breathing, and lets her know you're there
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: Your touch fails to provide encouragement.

strings.desc: Apply warm, wet towels to the perineum.
strings.pros: Useful during pushing to increase circulation and avoid tearing
strings.cons: Do not use if she has an epidural in place
strings.success_msg1: Heat on the perineum is wonderful.
strings.fail_msg1: The heat pack is distracting right now.

strings.desc: With a little research, you can find acupressure points and gently massage them.
strings.pros: Has been shown to decrease pain.
strings.cons: Needs some background research and/or practice
strings.fail_msg1: The acupressure fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Vocalize: make some noise
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: The mental focus helps cope with the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: Vocalization is not coming easily.
strings.fail_msg2: I feel silly making all these noises.

strings.desc: Focus on music or voice
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: The mental focus helps cope with the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: It is hard to focus on noises. They are so distracting.

strings.desc: Sit on the ball; lean over the ball; put the ball on the bed and lean on it
strings.pros: Changing position can help move the baby.
strings.fail_msg1: That position is uncomfortable.

strings.desc: Place your palms on her shoulders, lower back, or hands.
strings.pros: It helps her know you're there.
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.fail_msg1: Your touch fails to provide encouragement.

strings.desc: Poker, Spades, or even War!
strings.pros: A card game is a good distraction in early labor, when things may not be progressing fast.
strings.cons: In active labor and beyond, do not try to distract her.
strings.success_msg1: The card game is fun and distracting.
strings.fail_msg1: Distraction is not appropriate at this point.
strings.fail_msg2: A card game right now? No way!

strings.desc: Hold her hand.
strings.pros: It helps her know you're there.
strings.fail_msg1: Your touch fails to provide encouragement.

strings.desc: Narcotics used are about 100 times stronger than morphine; injected into the IV.
strings.pros: In active labor and beyond, narcotics are reported to "take the edge off."
strings.cons: Labor is confined to the bed; each subsequent dose works less well; when it wears off, contractions are stronger
strings.success_msg1: The drugs take the edge off the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: The drugs do not provide adequate relief.
strings.fail_msg2: The drugs didn't do anything for my pain.

strings.desc: When hospital policy does not allow eating solids, a popsicle is a good source of energy.
strings.pros: Gives her an energy boost (and sugar rush).
strings.fail_msg1: The popsicle fails to satisfy hunger.

strings.desc: When hospital policy does not allow eating or drinking, offer ice chips.
strings.pros: Relieves a dry, thirsty mouth
strings.fail_msg1: Ice chips fail to satisfy thirst.

strings.desc: When hungry, she should eat. It gives her energy.
strings.pros: Energy boost.
strings.fail_msg1: The sandwich fails to satisfy hunger.

strings.desc: When thirsty, she should drink.
strings.pros: Relieves thirst.
strings.fail_msg1: The water does not satisfy thirst.

strings.desc: Focus on a photograph, pattern, or other visual element.
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: The mental focus helps cope with the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: Focusing right now is impossible.

strings.desc: You (or a nurse) can massage her perineum with thumb and forefinger.
strings.pros: Help her focus her pushing efforts and help prevent tearing.
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.success_msg1: The massage helps to focus pushing efforts.
strings.fail_msg1: The massage distracts from pushing.

strings.desc: Breathe in time with the contractions, music, or ticking clock.
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: Breathing in rhythm helps stay on top of the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: Rhythmic breathing fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Show her how to breathe, slowly and deeply, by breathing with her.
strings.pros: Can help her to regain control.
strings.success_msg1: Breathing together helps to stay on top of the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: Help with breathing fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Take a shower.
strings.pros: Relief, relaxation, pain relief, and control. Water on the back can help ease back labor.
strings.success_msg1: The shower is a welcome relief.
strings.fail_msg1: The shower fails to provide relief.
strings.fail_msg2: The shower is an awful place for me!

strings.desc: Immerse in a bath tub filled with warm (not hot) water.
strings.pros: Relief, relaxation, pain relief, and control
strings.cons: Labor progress can be slowed if entering before active labor.
strings.success_msg1: The warm bath water takes the edge off the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: The bath fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Immerse in a bath tub filled with warm (not hot) water.
strings.pros: Relief, relaxation, pain relief, and control
strings.cons: Labor progress can be slowed if entering before active labor.
strings.success_msg1: The warm bath water takes the edge off the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: The large tub fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Get up and move.
strings.pros: Upright positions can decrease pain and shorten labor; changing position can help move the baby
strings.fail_msg1: Changing position fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Yes, kissing.
strings.pros: Smooching has been shown to release endorphins and oxytocin
strings.success_msg1: The contractions come in a quick flurry, but the baby moves down so much faster.
strings.fail_msg1: Kissing fails to provide any relief.

strings.desc: "You look powerful."
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.fail_msg1: Your compliments fail to provide relief.

strings.desc: "It's almost over; you're doing great."
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.fail_msg1: Your encouragement fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Be positive. "Repeat after me: I am doing this."
strings.pros: A positive attitude can have tangible results.
strings.success_msg1: Repeating positive things helps maintain a positive attitude.
strings.success_msg2: I can do this. I am doing this.
strings.fail_msg1: Your affirmation fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Get up and move.
strings.pros: Upright positions can decrease pain and shorten labor; changing positions can help move the baby
strings.fail_msg1: Standing and walking fail to provide relief.
strings.fail_msg2: I can't move, much less walk.

strings.desc: A rolling pin can be used as a massage tool to help with back labor.
strings.pros: Massage can provide pain relief and psychological support
strings.cons: When more concentration is required, touch can be a distraction.
strings.success_msg1: The massage provides some relief against back pain.
strings.fail_msg1: The rolling pressure fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Squeeze her hips together from both sides of her body.
strings.pros: Widens the opening of her pelvis
strings.success_msg1: The double hip squeeze provides some relief.
strings.fail_msg1: The double hip squeeze fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Really try to relax during and/or between contractions.
strings.pros: Relaxation uses less energy; mental activity has been shown to decrease pain
strings.success_msg1: Relaxing the muscles makes them hurt less.
strings.fail_msg1: Relaxation is impossible.
strings.fail_msg2: I can't relax! It's too intense!

strings.desc: Press hard on her lower back.
strings.pros: Can help with back labor
strings.success_msg1: The counterpressure helps against back labor.
strings.fail_msg1: The counterpressure fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Rose oil, lavender, and frankincense can help relieve anxiety, fear, and pain.
strings.pros: Some women find aromatherapy helpful.
strings.cons: Some women are sensitive to smells in labor.
strings.success_msg1: The scents provide some relief against pain and nausea.
strings.fail_msg1: Aromatherapy fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Apply a heat pack to her back, lower abdomen, or groin.
strings.pros: Provides distraction; blocks the transmission of pain to the brain; helps with back labor
strings.cons: Bad if she is already hot, or she has an epidural in place
strings.success_msg1: The heat pack provides some relief.
strings.fail_msg1: The heat pack fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Apply a cold pack to her back, chest, or face; massage between thumb and palm with iced washcloth
strings.pros: Can relieve muscle spasms and inflammation.
strings.cons: If she's cold, she won't like a cold pack.
strings.success_msg1: The cold pack provides some relief.
strings.fail_msg1: The cold pack fails to provide relief.

strings.desc: Imagine the details of a pleasant place, or what happens when the baby descends.
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: The mental focus helps cope with the contractions.
strings.success_msg2: I see myself opening like a soft angora sweater over my baby's head.
strings.fail_msg1: Visualization right now is impossible.

strings.desc: During a contraction, count with her each breath she takes.
strings.pros: Mental activity can distract from labor pain.
strings.success_msg1: The mental focus helps cope with the contractions.
strings.fail_msg1: Counting the breaths fails to provide relief.
strings.fail_msg2: Tell me how many breaths are left!

strings.desc: During a contraction, count to ten as she holds her breath and bears down.
strings.pros: Accelerates the descent of the baby
strings.cons: Most difficult and tiring way to push
strings.success_msg1: The baby moves down more quickly.
strings.fail_msg1: Directed pushing is too intense and painful.
strings.fail_msg2: Don't tell me what to do!

strings.desc: The nurse will feel the cervix, checking for dilation, effacement, and the baby's position.
strings.pros: Gives information about the progress of labor; can increase the strength and rate of contractions for a short time
strings.cons: Remember that dilation is just a number, and does not predict the length of labor.
strings.fail_msg1: The exam fails to determine how far labor has progressed.

strings.desc: Get her to lie down on her back in bed.
strings.pros: She can relax.
strings.cons: This position goes against gravity; the baby may have a hard time moving down.
strings.fail_msg1: The baby stops moving down as well.
strings.fail_msg2: This feels awful. I need to get up.
